entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #61777
  • [OpenAPI] XML Comments not translated to OpenApi json #61776
  • Get rid of custom reference resolution system, use built-in nuget features #61775
  • Allow the `sub` for a user-jwt to be set, independent of the `name` #61773
  • Minimal API Validation throws when using Entity Framework #61770
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61769
  • Add `PersistKeysToStackExchangeRedis` overload which accepts `Func<IServiceProvider, IDatabase>` #61768
  • Kestrel HTTP3 endpoint validate server name for client certificate by default #61767

Closed

  • Min API validation throws when IValidatableObject returns ValidationResult without MemberNames #61739
  • Check minified .js files back in #56933
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Min API validation doesn't consider List<T>? members #61737
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61765

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Update Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel to 8.0.2 #61779
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cd430b4` to `90a4152` #61772
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump dotnet/arcade from 11c848003df85813f4821fec2d43290fd4ca8594 to 43abe63bfc701d34e6599490a557a74710693410 #61771
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Make IValidatableObject handling more resilient for MemberNames #61778
    area-minimal, feature-validation, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix username for dependabot #61774
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix handling of nullable types in validations generator #61766
    area-minimal, feature-validation, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun
  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #61593
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview5
  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Remove the check for `cacheBootResources` from Auto render mode detection #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
